ch.lambdaj.function.closure
Class ClosuresFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.lambdaj.function.closure.ClosuresFactory

public final class ClosuresFactory
extends Object

An utility class of static factory methods that create closures

Author:
Mario Fusco

Method Detail

bindClosure

public static <T> T bindClosure(Object closed,
                                Class<T> closedClass)
Binds an object to the active closure that is the last one created in the current thread.

Parameters:
closed - The object that has to be bind to the active closure
closedClass - The actual class of the proxied object
Returns:
An instance of the closedClass that is actually a proxy used to register all the invocation on the closed object

createClosure

public static Closure createClosure()
Creates a generic (not typed) closure and binds it to the current thread

Returns:
The newly created closure

createClosure

public static <A> Closure1<A> createClosure(Class<A> type1)
Creates a closure with a single free variable and binds it to the current thread

Parameters:
type1 - The type of the free variable of the newly created closure
Returns:
The newly created closure

createClosure

public static <A,B> Closure2<A,B> createClosure(Class<A> type1,
                                                Class<B> type2)
Creates a closure with two free variables and binds it to the current thread

Parameters:
type1 - The type of the first free variable of the newly created closure
type2 - The type of the second free variable of the newly created closure
Returns:
The newly created closure

Parameters:

type3 - The type of the third free variable of the newly created closure

createClosure

                                                        Class<B> type2,
                                                        Class<C> type3,
                                                        Class<D> type4)
Creates a closure with three free variables and binds it to the current thread

Parameters:
type1 - The type of the first free variable of the newly created closure
type2 - The type of the second free variable of the newly created closure
type3 - The type of the third free variable of the newly created closure
type4 - The type of the fourth free variable of the newly created closure
Returns:
The newly created closure

createClosureVarPlaceholder

public static <T> T createClosureVarPlaceholder(Class<T> clazz)
Defines a free variable of the given Class for the currently active closure

Parameters:
clazz - The Class of the new variable
Returns:
A placeholder that represent a free closure variable of the given Class
